title: emacs go-mode hangs when doing a copy-paste on comments lines
body:
by **sdemingo**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Start Emacs with "go-mode" from the Go version 1 and GNU Emacs 23.1.1

2. Create new file with a hello word example:
package main
func main(){
	fmt.Printf("hello\n")
}

3. Comment a line:
package main
func main(){
	//fmt.Printf("hello\n")
}

4. Select the commented line with the mouse

5. Try to paste it on another place


What is the expected output?

package main
func main(){
	//fmt.Printf("hello\n")
        fmt.Printf("hello\n")
}


What do you see instead?
The line is pasted and Emacs stops responding


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
go command

Which operating system are you using?
Linux 2.6.32-40-generic 

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version go1
